name: Lost Ligaments
description:
Search the dungeon for your missing body parts in this physics-based metroidvania. Become whole again in order to win the game!

GMTK game jam 2021, the theme was "Joined together". In this game, you must join together with your body parts to unleash all of your moves.

Controls:

W and D to move, you know the drill

SPACE to jump

SHIFT (either one) to change back into a skull

S to slam while in the air

W to use doors and to climb vines.

Gameplay:

Physics-based platformer. Use momentum to avoid danger, make jumps, and find collectibles. Each body part you unlock increases your maneuverability.
